import SendEmail from "../forms/sendEmail"; import Dropzone from './dropzone'; import Modal from "../componenets/modal"; const HeaderDropdown = ({dropDownStatus, loggedUser}) => { const [modalData, setModalData] = useState({active: true, data: "", action: ""}); const renderProfile = () => { return( FIRST NAME: {loggedUser.firstName} LAST NAME: {loggedUser.lastName} E:MAIL: {loggedUser.email} ROLE: {loggedUser.roleType} REMAINING DAYS OFF: {loggedUser.daysOffLeft} TEAM: ) } const renderPanel = () => { return( ) } return(
{renderProfile()}
{renderPanel()}
) } export default HeaderDropdown;
